text:
[img[https://i.postimg.cc/T14wqQXn/farlay.jpg]]

Swordbrother {{!!title}} is the main combat instructor at the Palaestra of the [[Martial Temple of Dol Arrah]] in [[Starilaskur]]. He is a member of the Order of the [[Broken Blade]], and a [[cleric]] of the [[War Domain]].
title: Farlay
tags: Starilaskur humanoid [[Martial Temple of Dol Arrah]] human cleric [[Broken Blade]]
